insights.author: @35KYSportsMedia
insights.text: Louisville basketball great Reyne Smith launching RS Academy training app. Focus: Personalized workouts, real breakdowns, clear plan vs randomness.
insights.opportunity: Monitor RS Academy positioning. Differentiate: Verified combine data vs personalized workouts.
insights.engagement_action: MONITOR - Don't engage yet, study their messaging first
insights.notes: RS Academy = workout-focused (drills, training plans). CourtLab = measurement-focused (verified stats, combine data). Different positioning.

insights.author: @MrMrmusiczoo
insights.text: just made my #basketball app for #playerdevelopment sign up get your training and skills up
insights.relevance: MEDIUM - Indie developer launching basketball app
insights.opportunity: Low engagement (0 likes/RTs). Market crowded with small apps.
insights.notes: Generic player development app. No clear differentiation.

insights.author: @GalenHarkness
insights.text: If this was helpful, we break this down every week and train it in the gym. EYG camps, training programs, and player development
insights.opportunity: Skills coach promoting camps/programs. Potential affiliate target.
insights.engagement_action: MONITOR - Skills coaches are affiliate prospects
insights.notes: Galen Harkness runs EYG camps. Could be affiliate partner later.

insights.author: @Ayisha_Balogun
insights.text: Highlight from Australian Country Junior Basketball Cup - thankful to have competed
insights.opportunity: Youth player showcasing skills at Australian tournament. Target demographic.
insights.engagement_action: ENGAGE - Reply with encouragement, mention verified stats
insights.notes: Australian Country Junior Basketball Cup = target event for CourtLab presence

insights.author: @BJCole10
insights.text: The person who can revive the Bullets to be the powerhouse in Australian basketball deserves multiple medals
insights.opportunity: Brisbane Bullets revival discussion. Australian basketball passion.
insights.engagement_action: SKIP - Not relevant to youth/coach market
insights.notes: NBL pro team discussion. CourtLab targets youth/development market.

competitor_mentions.name: RS Academy
competitor_mentions.author: @reynesmith (Reyne Smith)
competitor_mentions.positioning: Personalized workouts, structure vs randomness, shooting focus
competitor_mentions.notes: Louisville basketball great. Credibility + shooting expertise. Workout-focused vs CourtLab's measurement focus.

engagement_queue.action: Reply with encouragement + mention verified stats
engagement_queue.draft: Great work at the Australian Country Junior Cup! üèÄ Your dedication shows. When you're ready to track verified combine data and prove your progress, CourtLab has your back. Keep grinding! üí™
